title: ISRO Returns Chandrayaan-3 Prop Module To Earth Orbit As Lunar Return Tech Demo
summary: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) has made a surprise announcement, announcing they have successfully brought the Chandrayann-3 Propulsion Module back to Earth orbit.

title: Stratolaunch Conducts Captive Carry Flight of Talon-A Hypersonic Vehicle
summary: Stratolaunch, LLC has successfully completed a captive carry flight featuring the first powered Talon-A hypersonic vehicle, TA-1.

title: NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope Operations Suspended Due To Gyro Issue
summary: NASA iconic space observatory, the Hubble Space Telescope has suspended science operations and is in safe mode due to a problem with one of its three operational gyroscopes.

title: NRO signs agreements with five  commercial suppliers of electro-optical imagery
summary: WASHINGTON — The National Reconnaissance Office announced Dec. 5 it has signed agreements with five commercial providers of electro-optical satellite imagery, including four startups that are just starting to build […]

title: The 2023 SpaceNews Icon Awards: Winners
